-e ---

𒁍 BU

𓃀 𓍢 𓇩 abstract 𓃀 𓅱 𓇩 Buch marker to turn adjectives into verbs or nouns

𓃀 𓍢 𓇩 ⋍ 𓊪 𓅮 𓄿 ⋍ Ⲡ ⲡ ⋍ π

𓃀 𓍢 𓇩 be- being- -पनि / भाव (bhāva)

𓃀 𓅱 𓄤 𓆑 𓂋 | good, goodness | beauty

𓃀 𓅱 | place | 𓌥 𓃀 𓅱 𓏛 𓏥 ḏbꜣwᵐ replacement 𒈭𒄷𒌝 dahᵇhu-um tahhum

𓃀𓍢𓎟 all people ⇔ poly pan

𓃀 𓏤 𓌷 𓂝 𓏜 | truth | bumaath µb.mꜣꜥt phlegmao beingmath
𓃀 𓏤 𓌷 𓂝 𓏜 | truth | bèrdat > veridad ⇔ realidad 𓃹 𓈖 𓌷 𓂝 𓏜

ብእሲ bəʾəsi (𓃀 𓍢 𓇩) 𓊃 𓀀
ብእሲት bəʾəsit (𓃀 𓍢 𓇩) 𓊃 𓏏 𓁐, 𓃀 𓂓 𓏏 𓁑

𓃀𓍢 as article developed into coptic :

π pi ⇔ pthe ⇔ bder pinoqio 𓂊

pro- greek prefix
per- latin prefix

be-… german prefix (Begriff) ⇔ causative
bu-… бу бо пу turkish prefix (the/this) 𓂧 𓂋 𓄛||bat (mammal)| bat < বাদুড় baduṛ < bu.𓂧𓂋𓄛

  1. 𓄤 nefer schön=fair
  2. 𓃀𓍢𓄤 bein'fair = beauty
  3. नग्न naken => नग्नपनि nakedness -पनि ⋍ being 𓃀𓍢 -pean / -pion

Related suffix -𓇋𓇋

𓇓𓏏 sultan => 𓇓 𓏏 𓇋 𓇋 Sultanei (kingship)
𓇓 𓏏 𓇋 𓇋 𓏏 𓏛 kingship : sultanate

naked>nude⋍𓇉𓄿<nauth/nord=𓇉 vs Neger?
*skey:part => Scheibe

⇔ 𒉆 nam nomen-ness
⇔ 𒁴 -tim ⋍ 𒌈 -tum abstract noun suffix (Reichtum, freedom…) ⇔ -tion -ty -de
